title: The Blight's Core
goal: Kaelen confronts the true nature of the Whispering Corruption and his role in its awakening.

beats.summary: Kaelen penetrates to the very core of the Whispering Corruption, facing its true, ancient intelligence.
He discovers it is not merely evil, but a corrupted fragment of a primordial force or a misguided entity he once sought to understand or control.
Kaelen engages in a mental and magical confrontation, realizing that defeating it requires more than brute force; it requires understanding and a new form of sealing or containment.
